1.title: Celebrity special featuring Ray Jorden at The old mill house
1.plot: Joined by guest celebrity Ray Jorden from Haunting Australia. The team adventure to a private old mill 1600 century home in Wiltshire, where they experience extraordinary activity in and around the grounds. Could this be the most haunted home in Wiltshire?

2.title: Tudor World Stratford upon Avon
2.plot: join us as we adventure though this very old reputedly haunted building. we will lead you through the museum relating the stories of the sightings and some of the history of the building. to help us in this quest we are joined by Wessex paranormal investigations.

3.title: The legends of wreckers and smugglers at the Jamaica Inn Part1
3.plot: join us as we adventure though this very old reputedly haunted Inn. we will lead you through the museum relaying the stories of the sightings and some of the history of the building. To help us in this quest we are joined by Jamaica Inn paranormal investigation team. Part 1 of 2

4.title: The legends of wreckers and smugglers at the Jamaica Inn Part 2
4.plot: join us as we adventure though this very old reputedly haunted Inn. we will lead you through the Bars and Giftshop relaying the stories of the sightings and some of the history of the building. To help us in this quest we are joined by Jamaica Inn paranormal investigation team. Part 2 of 2

5.title: Whistling soldiers of Nothe Fort
5.plot: The team are joined by ESN Paranormal at Nothe Fort, in the light of the day the history jumps out at you. In the dark of the night the tunnels and its off set rooms is a very eerie place. pitch black tunnels leaving you confused as to where you are, But make sure you don't go off on your own, or you may find yourself lost and cowering in a dark corner.

6.title: The Radstock Hotel - Spirits of Radstock part 1
6.plot: The team have been summoned to this old mining town to investigate the Radstock Hotel for 2 night to find answers, what we found was mind blowing. The most prominent spirit in the hotel lurks upstairs on the 2nd floor where a murder had taken place. chills down your spine this place has got it all.

7.title: The Radstock Hotel - Spirits of Radstock Part 2
7.plot: Join the team for the second part to investigate the Radstock Hotel for 2 night to find answers, what we found was mind blowing. The most prominent spirit in the hotel lurks upstairs on the 2nd floor where a murder had taken place. chills down your spine this place has got it all.

8.title: Night Frights the Bear Hotel Devizes
8.plot: The team are joined with Night Frights Paranormal to investigate The Bear Hotel in Devizes Wiltshire to find answers of the of the after life, what we found was mind blowing, chills down your spine this place has got it all.

9.title: Margam Castle
9.plot: Join us as we adventure though this very old reputedly haunted building. we will lead you through this gothic mansion relating the stories of the sightings and some of the history of the building. To help us in this quest we are joined South Bristol Paranormal team Alan Pine and Ginny Fear.

10.title: Derby Gaol with Richard Felix
10.plot: Join us as we adventure though this very old reputedly haunted building, Derby Gaol relating the stories of the sightings and some of the history of the building. To help us in this quest we are joined by the godfather of the paranormal. Richard Felix.

imdb.plot outline: A fresh new season of true paranormal investigation. The team join forces with fellow investigators throughout the UK in search of paranormal existence. Using various methods from several teams and a special celebrity guest we encounter some truly interesting experiences that could not be explained.
imdb.title: Ghost Response Haunted UK
plot: A fresh new season of true paranormal investigation. The team join forces with fellow investigators throughout the UK in search of paranormal existence. Using various methods from several teams and a special celebrity guest we encounter some truly interesting experiences that could not be explained.
